about.html: Hi, I’m Ash – an artist, researcher and composer. My work explores human-computer interaction, knowledge representation and personal data science (mainly for the arts). My primary occupation is a PhD in Artificial Intelligence and Music, where I am investigating the implications of explainable AI for human-computer music generation. If you would like to collaborate, or have any questions about my work, feel free to contact me at: a.l.noel-hirst[at]qmul[dot]ac[dot]uk
